__e: We realize that you're required to look into these issues, but grilling our friends about my wife's drinking habits?

I know that this sounds disappointing, but is better to stop living in this fantasy world, where you think that you can quit eveything in the blink of an eye, change your habits, become a different person.

What happens next has to do with the drinking habits of the people who live here, in and around the city of Munich in southern Germany, and especially, what's going on right now, about 50 feet above my head:
He had habits and weird shit he did the same, day after day.
The time had come to let go... to let go of old habits and old dreams.
Because I'm an old man who has habits and it would be difficult to live without them.
